attributes.additional_details:
The inefficiency of CAFCASS is a diabolical fact.

The current trend for CAFCASS workers to base their recommendations on one phone call is absolutely insane.

Some CAFCASS workers also find it appropriate to make Section 7 report recommendations without first obtaining essential safeguarding checks. This places children at great risk.

These people can be condescending, sarcastic, bullying, patronising, downright useless and can earn up to £45k pa....for what?!

I would like to gain as many signatures to this e-petition as possible so that I can lodge an official complaint about CAFCASS via my MP to the Ministry of Justice.

Don't let CAFCASS into your lives, they will destroy it!

rejection.details: You can write directly to your MP to complain - you don't need a petition. If you do want to raise a petition, what do you want the Government to do?
